name: CloudBudget
tag_list: budget, budgeting, saas, salesforce, force-com, planning, performance-management, financial, finance, business
overview:
CloudBudget is a start-up aiming to alter the way small and medium organizations manage the budgeting process. We use SaaS to provide clients with a secure, automated, on-demand budgeting system that greatly reduces expenses by eliminating the hidden costs behind Excel and largely eliminating the need to engage consultants.

CloudBudget is built on the popular Force.com platform and is closely aligned with SalesForce products.

As a SalesForce partner we run CloudBudget on SalesForce servers and infrastructure. Users get uninterrupted system availability, fast response times, and the highest data security.

As with SalesForce products, customers pay monthly subscription fees based upon the desired number of licenses and the particular level of service required.

CloudBudget is built on the Force.com platform, however CloudBudget is a standalone service, meaning users do not need to have or purchase SalesForce products in order to take advantage of CloudBudget.

provider.name: Gunderson Dettmer Stough Villeneuve Franklin & Hachigian, LLP

milestones.description: Nikolay Khoteev, finance industry veteran, founds CloudBudget
Robert Morrison joins CloudBudget as Partner, Sales and Marketing
Stanislav Platonov joins CloudBudget as Head of Development
Thede Loder, Boxbe Founder and Silicon Valley veteran joins CloudBudget as an Advisor
